name: Pyramids
overview: Pyramids is a puzzle-platformer similar to Solomon's Key. The player must reach the the exit of each level by collecting the key, which they can reach by producing and removing blocks to walk on. They can also collect gold coins and other treasure to increase their score for each level. Hazards include spikes on the floor, flame and snakes, which the player can shoot at once they have collected bullets, and they can also use TNT where it is place in a level. There are 54 levels in total.
